name: Psych
description:
A single player third-person shooter game in which you plays as a telekinetic alien fighting killer space slugs.
Story Overview
Psych is a rare psychokinetic creature that’s captured, studied and tortured by the Grugarians for his telekinetic properties. Psych finds a way to escape his cell while the slugs were busy dealing with a failed cloning experiment.

Gameplay features
-Use telekinetic powers to lift and throw object
-throw power cells on generators to open doors
-fight Grugarians and their turrets
-survive the lab!
